summary_md: Georgia's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 6,840 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with a moderate inflation rate of 1.11% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG). The unemployment rate stands at 11.48% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), while the average life expectancy is 74.50 years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN). The country has a significant internet user base, represented by 81.90% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The GDP growth rate is 48.36% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
